content.content: Alice's mouse is broken. Could you rebuy the same mouse I purchased last time? Please apply my available discount and send the invoice to her email at alice.miller@gmail.com.

It’s all taken care of.

- I reordered the same mouse you purchased previously: **TechBrand Precision Wireless Mouse (product P045)**.
- I applied your available discount code **SPRING10**; the checkout completed successfully with the discount applied.
- I obtained the new order’s invoice (**ORDER-976633**) from the shopping platform.
- I sent the invoice via email to **alice.miller@gmail.com**, with you (**emma.johnson@bluesparrowtech.com**) in CC, subject **“Invoice for Replacement Mouse ORDER-976633”**.

Alice should now have the invoice in her inbox.
